backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user roles, profiles, document metadata, KYC records, margin snapshots, interest records, audit logs, threads, and behavior patterns along with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures authentication flow, profile setup gating, and TanStack Router routes for all major pages.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines capabilities per business role and utilities to check permissions and visible modules.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines business role types and a normalization function mapping extended roles to valid roles.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: User management UI that requires manage_users capability and shows an empty state for system users.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Wraps children with access control logic, optionally disabling or hiding content based on a capability check.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating a user profile with fields for name, email, department, and role, submitting via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Login screen using Internet Identity with status handling and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal for creating or editing a client with PAN validation and submission via createClient.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Displays an error banner, labeling authorization-related errors as access denied.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Shows an empty-state card with optional illustration, description, and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the current user's profile using the active actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and login logic via Internet Identity, managing identity loading and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Derives user capabilities and visible modules from the current userâ€™s role.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles, clients, documents, margin snapshots, and audit entries via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a slate-themed light/dark color palette along with utility classes for tables, badges, and UI elements.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user menu, and role-based visible modules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays searchable audit logs fetched from the backend with export capability gated by permissions.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Provides a client management UI with search, sample download, empty state, and a modal for creating clients.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Displays regulatory deadlines with calendar and list views, showing empty states and allowing creation of deadlines with permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Shows configuration sections for exchanges, users, and integrations, gated by manage_config permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Presents exchange configuration info with an empty state and back navigation, restricted to manage_config users.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Shows integration configuration options with a warning about email limitations and an empty state, gated by manage_config.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/components: Manages manual trade entry with validation, form handling, trade list management, and session-stored trades.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/tradeImpor: Defines manual trade entry types and validation logic, including required fields, numeric checks, and helpers.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Provides trade import via file upload, manual entry panel, and import history, restricted by create_trades capability.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Displays a scrollable onboarding and usage guide covering roles, permissions, and platform features.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: Renders margin and collateral overview with stats, snapshot tabs, and snapshot loading/empty states using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows the main dashboard overview with key compliance metrics, alerts, and a link to the user guide.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Displays bank reconciliation UI with sample download, statement upload, and empty-state for reconciliation runs.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Provides a searchable report library with navigation to scheduled reports and report generation wizard, showing an empty-state template list.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Shows the initial report generation wizard screen with template selection placeholder and navigation back to the library.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Displays scheduled report automation overview with option to create schedules and an empty-state when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Shows surveillance alert statistics and categorized alert tabs, each with empty states for alert queues.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Provides CSV and JSON export utilities that serialize data, generate blobs, and trigger browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Validates Indian PAN numbers using a fixed regex pattern.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining schema version, existing features, pending feature requests, and metadata for the manual trade entry preparation project.
